channel.title: TFX on Tutorials made by GDEs
channel.description: Recent content in TFX on Tutorials made by GDEs

item.title: Introduction to TFX CLI
item.description: The main advantage of using TFX CLI is that you can get a fully working end to end example out of the box. Also, many customizable points are already included such as how to leverage BigQuery, Vertex AI Training/Serving, Dataflow GCP infrastructure. You will see a full capability of TFX at hand with a template project. There are two template projects, taxi and penguin at the moment, and we will use taxi template.

item.title: Learn how to get two different models for cloud and edge device respectively on Vertex AI Pipeline.
Learn how to integrate GitHub Action, Cloud Build, and TFX based project for realizing CI/CD in MLOps.
